launch.input_mnemonic_hint: Please enter mnemonic words and separate by space.
launch.create_wallet_warn1: Password is used to protect private key and transaction authorization.
launch.create_wallet_warn2: We will not store your password and cannot help you to recover the password, please backup cautiously.
launch.why_backup_wallet: Why need to backup mnemonic words?
launch.reason_backup_wallet1: Mnemonic words can restore your wallet. Anyone in possession of your mnemonic words will have access of your assets!
launch.reason_backup_wallet2: We will not store your password and cannot help you to recover the password, please backup cautiously.
launch.reason_backup_wallet3: Please write down the mnemonic words on the paper and keep them in a safe place.
launch.reason_backup_wallet4: Do not save mnemonic words on mailbox or network disk. Do not use network tools for transmission.
launch.readed: I understand. And I have already prepared paper and pen.
launch.backup_mnemonic_prompt: Please write down the mnemonic words carefully. We will verify them in the next step.
launch.confirm_mnemonic_prompt: Please click the mnemonic words in order to confirm your backup correctly.
launch.password_warn: Passwords must be at least 8 characters in length, contain at least 3 out of 4 of the following: one uppercase, one lowercase, one digit and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_least_8: The password must be at lease 8 characters in length,
launch.password_warn_1: passwords should contain at least 2 out of the following: one uppercase, one digit and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_2: passwords should contain at least 2 out of the following: one uppercase, one digit and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_3: passwords should contain at least 2 out of the following: one uppercase, one lowercase and one symbol.
launch.password_warn_4: passwords should contain at least 2 out of the following: one uppercase, one lowercase and one digit.
launch.password_warn_5: passwords should contain at least one digit or one symbol.
launch.password_warn_6: passwords should contain at least one lowercase or one symbol.
launch.password_warn_7: passwords should contain at least one lowercase or one digit.
launch.password_warn_8: passwords should contain at least one uppercase or one symbol.
launch.password_warn_9: passwords should contain at least one uppercase or one digit.
launch.password_warn_10: passwords should contain at least one uppercase or one lowercase.

home.symbol_check: 1 to 9 characters, for example ETH and ITC
home.decimals_check: The decimal precision of erc20 token is 0~36, mostly 18 digits.
home.address_repeat: The contract address has been added

transaction.alert_2: Please enter a valid transfer address.
transaction.alert_3: Please enter a valid transfer amount.
transaction.alert_5: Please open the camera access first.

settings.export_keystore_modal_prompt: Anyone in possession of your Keystore will have access to your assets!
settings.export_keystore_prompt: Anyone in possession of your Keystore will have access of your assets! Do not save Keystore on mailbox or network disk. Do not use network tools for transmission.
settings.export_private_key_modal_prompt: Anyone in possession of your private key will have access of your assets!
settings.export_private_key_modal_prompt1: Please keep only hardcopy and keep it safe.
settings.export_private_key_prompt: Do not save mnemonic words on mailbox or network disk. Do not use network tools for transmission..
settings.scan_qrcode_prompt: The QR code can be automatically scanned by putting it into the frame.
settings.make_sure_delete_contact: Are you sure you want to delete this contact?
settings.name: Name

toast.exit_app: Click again to exit the app.
toast.not_modified_wallet_name: You did not change the wallet name.
toast.enter_valid_transfer_address: Please enter a valid transfer address.

modal.permission_storage: Please allow permission to read and write storage space.
modal.screenshot_warn_content: Anyone in possession of your mnemonic words will have access to your assets! Please keep only hardcopy and keep it safe.
modal.password_error: Incorrect password. Please enter the correct password.
modal.permission_camera: Please open the camera access first.
modal.get_private_key_fail: Failed to acquire the private key.
modal.transaction_failed: Transaction failed. Please check the parameters.
modal.enter_valid_transfer_address: Please enter a valid transfer address.
modal.enter_valid_transfer_amount: Please enter a valid transfer amount.
